title: University League of Legends Not sending Verification email
body: I have to register for ULoL and when I enter my university email and hit register I am greeted with the "You will receive a verification email, please check your email" type thing. The only issue is when I go to my university email I do not receive this email and have no trace of an email whatsoever.

replies.body: Hey!  Have you checked your spam folder, there's a chance it could have ended up there some how.  Have you confirmed which address the verification is being sent to?
